title: Syntax Checker
desc: A real-time multi-language code runner and validator featuring an editor where users can enter code snippets, execute them using the Piston API, and instantly view results and history. Supports JavaScript, Java, C/C++, Python, Ruby, and Go with syntax highlighting and code formatting.
alt: Screenshot of the Syntax Checker code editor and results panel

title: Fitness Tracking App
desc: A cross-platform mobile application built with React Native that helps users track their workouts, nutrition, and progress. Features include customizable workout plans, progress charts, and social sharing.

title: Banking Dashboard UI
desc: A modern and intuitive dashboard interface for a banking application. Designed with a focus on user experience and accessibility, using Figma and implemented with React and Tailwind CSS.
alt: Preview of the Banking Dashboard UI with various banking features

title: Journey Blogging Platform
desc: A Medium-inspired blogging platform that allows users to publish, read, and explore blogs across categories like programming, film-making, travel, cooking, and more. Features include user authentication, trending stories, search, and category filtering. Built as a full-stack project and currently 85% complete.
alt: Preview of the Journey Blogging Platform homepage with trending blog cards

title: Food Delivery App
desc: A food delivery mobile application with real-time order tracking, restaurant discovery, and payment processing. Built with Flutter and Firebase for iOS and Android platforms.

title: Travel Platform UI
desc: A visually stunning UI design for a travel booking platform, featuring destination discovery, itinerary planning, and booking management. Designed with Adobe XD and implemented with Angular.
alt: Preview of the Travel Platform UI design with destination cards
